error.400: Bad request; please verify data and retry.
error.401: Something went wrong; please refresh page.
error.403: Something went wrong; please refresh page.
error.genericError: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry

validations.minFieldError: At least one field is required.
validations.noQuotationMarks: Do not surround words with quotation marks.
validations.somethingWentWrong: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.
validations.maxLength: Do not exceed more than __length__ characters.
validations.eachTermMaxLength: Do not exceed more than __length__ characters for each term.
validations.noSpecialCharacters: Do not use special characters; only letters and numbers are allowed.
validations.noCharactersOnlyNumber: Do not use letters or special characters; only numbers are allowed.
validations.minTwoPair: At least one comma-separated pair of values is required.
validations.noTrailingCommas: Add another term or remove the extra comma.
validations.noRecordsFound: No records found in CSV file.
validations.inlineBannerPosition: Position must be greater than zero
validations.endDateMustBeLater: End date must be later than start date.
validations.startDateMustBeBefore: Start date must be before end date.
validations.endDateMustBeInTheFuture: End date must be in the future.
validations.invalidData: Invalid data format in CSV file.
validations.greaterThanZero: Input value must be greater than zero
validations.invalidPlaceholderFormat: Include at least one placeholder like %example% anywhere in the text.

asklo.pageSubHeader: Asklo AI adds an AI-powered assistant to your product pages to instantly answer shopper questions—so they get the confidence they need to click "buy."
asklo.bannerTitle: Asklo AI keeps shoppers on the path to purchase
asklo.bannerSubTitle: By resolving last-minute doubts before they derail a sale, Asklo AI helps shoppers convert faster—while giving you insights into the questions they ask most.
asklo.ContactCustomerSuccessText: Instantly answer customer questions. __SignUpLink__ for a free 7-day trial.
asklo.infoSectionTitle: Ideal for brands that want to increase purchase rate, build trust, and convert curiosity into action, Asklo AI delivers always-on product Q&A with zero extra lift.
asklo.infoContent01: AI-powered product Q&A, live on your PDPs
asklo.infoContent03: Multilingual support included out of the box
asklo.infoContent04: Reduces cart abandonment and boosts conversion rates
asklo.featurePageTitle: Keep your shoppers on the path to purchase
asklo.featurePageSubTitle: By resolving last-minute doubts before they derail a sale, Asklo AI helps shoppers convert faster—while giving you insights into the questions they ask most.

beaconDataQualityReport.pageSubHeader: Product ranking and sorting behavior reports

expandedSearchReport.pageSubHeader: Measure how often expanded searches are triggered — and use those insights to refine your search customizations.

experimentsReport.pageSubHeader: Test, learn, and optimize with confidence — track the performance of merchandising experiments to make informed decisions that improve the shopper experience.
experimentsReport.currentCampaignsEmptyListTitle: No active experiments? Let’s change that.
experimentsReport.currentCampaignsEmptySubtitle: Head to your merchandising campaigns to start testing and uncover what drives better results.
experimentsReport.pastCampaignsEmptyListTitle: No past experiments? Let’s change that.
experimentsReport.pastCampaignsEmptySubtitle: Head to your merchandising campaigns to start testing and uncover what drives better results.

filtersReport.pageSubHeader: Identify your most used filters and refine them to better support shopper decision-making.

keywordsReport.pageSubHeader: Reports on popular trends and search terms.

productRecommendationsReport.pageSubHeader: Tracks profiles, revenue, and suggested products.

reportingAuth.authExpirySubtitle: We couldn't load the report. Please refresh the page and try again.

searchReport.pageSubHeader: Analyze what shoppers search for — and how they refine results — to uncover opportunities that boost discoverability.

sortsReport.pageSubHeader: See how shoppers reorder results to better match their needs — and use those insights to guide your default sort strategy.

spellCorrectionReport.pageSubHeader: See how often search errors occur and how your site corrects them, so you can optimize for a smoother search experience.

zeroResultsReport.pageSubHeader: Understand where searches fail to return results — and uncover opportunities to refine your search experience so shoppers can find what they need.

dataTransformations.pageSubHeader: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

fieldFilters.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this field filter?
fieldFilters.createFormTip: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
fieldFilters.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.

productFilters.tabPanelSubheaderLabel: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
productFilters.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this product filter?
productFilters.createFormTip: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
productFilters.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.

connectors.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine1: Athos Commerce puts merchants in control, enabling fast, reliable, and flexible data syncs across platforms and services.
connectors.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine2: Whether you're syncing product data from Shopify or enhancing personalization with Klaviyo, Athos Commerce makes it simple to connect, configure, and scale.
connectors.demoPageMiddleSection2SubTitleLine1: Athos Commerce gives you the control to choose exactly what data you want to sync. Our intuitive interface and platform-specific settings make it easy to tailor your data connections to your unique needs.
connectors.demoPageMiddleSection2SubTitleLine2: Whether you're pulling in products, blog content, or custom fields, you decide what matters most and when it gets updated, all without needing developer support.
connectors.demoPageBottomSectionLeftSide: Your product discovery strategy starts with connected data — Athos Commerce makes it simple.

filtering.pageSubHeader: Manage the filters shoppers see on your website to improve navigation and product discovery.
filtering.emptyFilteringListSubtitle: Filters allow customers to refine results by selecting attributes like size, brand, color, or price—helping them quickly find what they’re looking for.
filtering.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this filter?
filtering.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.
filtering.createFormTip: Note: Up to 25 filter fields will be displayed per page. This limit helps ensure optimal site performance and a smooth shopper experience.
filtering.createFormInfoSubTitle: Filters let you control which product attributes shoppers can use to narrow their results and find the right products faster.
filtering.createFormExampleContent: Adding a filter for "Color" allows shoppers to narrow results by available colors. For instance, a shopper searching for "running shoes" selects Color: Black, and the results update to show only products available in that color.

sorting.pageSubHeader: Manage the sorting options shoppers see on your website to align with shopper intent and merchandising priorities.
sorting.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this sorting option?
sorting.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.
sorting.emptySortFieldTooltipContent: To enable this sorting option, map the "__coreMappingsFieldname__" field in the Core Mappings page to the appropriate field for your platform.
sorting.createFormInfoSubTitle: Sorting options define how results are ordered on your website—by relevance, price, popularity, and more—so shoppers can browse in a way that best fits their needs.
sorting.createFormExampleContent: Adding the sort options "A to Z" and "Z to A" allows shoppers to organize results alphabetically, which is especially helpful when browsing for a specific product by name.

home.infoSectionTitle: We unify AI-driven search, merchandising and personalization into one precision-driven platform.
home.infoContent01: Athos Commerce helps brands sharpen visibility, refine operations, and turn every shopper interaction into growth across websites, marketplaces, and social commerce.
home.infoContent02: Join the thousands of brands that rely on Athos Commerce who want more: more visibility, more conversions, more growth — everywhere commerce happens.
home.footerContent01: The data presented in these images is derived from a real case study conducted by Athos Commerce.

bundleProfiles.pageSubHeader: Bundle Profiles are strategic groupings of related or complementary products curated to offer customers added value and convenience.
bundleProfiles.bannerTitle: Athos Bundling increases AOV without the heavy lift
bundleProfiles.bannerSubTitle: We pair AI-enriched data and machine learning insights with shopper behavior to automatically group products that make sense together — so customers discover more, and buy more.
bundleProfiles.bannerSubTitle01: Athos turns one-click purchases into multi-product orders with bundles that feel natural, not forced—leading to higher AOV and better shopper experiences.
bundleProfiles.ContactCustomerSuccessText: Interested in enabling this feature? Reach out to your Customer Success Manager or email us at __EmailID__ to learn more.
bundleProfiles.infoSectionTitle: Ideal for brands that want to inspire discovery and grow cart size without manual merchandising, Athos gives you multiple ways to showcase bundles to shoppers including frequently bought together (cross-sell), complete the look, trending, and session-based. With these types, bundling is available to add onto any site page.
bundleProfiles.infoContent01: 4 pre-built layout options: vertical, horizontal, easy-add, and list view
bundleProfiles.infoContent02: Build your own layout with customizable templates
bundleProfiles.infoContent03: Customizable product bundling rules or automated smart picks
bundleProfiles.infoContent04: Available for product page, homepage, cart page, and more!

personalization.pageSubHeader: Turn every visit into a personalized experience that increases conversion, loyalty, and lifetime value—delivering smarter suggestions across every touchpoint.
personalization.bannerSubTitle: AI-enriched data powers all our features to personalize every touchpoint in each shopper's journey.
personalization.ContactCustomerSuccessText: Interested in enabling this feature? Reach out to your Customer Success Manager or email us at __EmailID__ to learn more.
personalization.infoSectionTitle: Athos creates moments that matter—tailoring every touchpoint to each shopper's journey from real-time session-based suggestions to personalized segments for targeted messaging. With Athos, turn personalization into long-term customer loyalty.
personalization.infoContent02: Personalization of search and category results
personalization.infoContent03: Email and SMS marketing messaging & automation

recommendationProfiles.demoPageTopSectionSubTitle: AI-enriched data powers all our features to personalize every touchpoint in each shopper's journey.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine1: Our Athos Commerce personalization system is not a black box; we allow our customers to guide our AI & ML by setting up a variety of rules to match their business needs.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine6: Individual Product Curation for Both Similar and Cross-Sell
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection2SubTitleLine1: We offer a variety of recommendation types that can be utilized on the website, including cross-sell and similar recommendations, completing the look, trending items, and session-based suggestions.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection2SubTitleLine2: These recommendations can be displayed on any page of the website and are personalized for each shopper based on their current and past behaviors.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection3SubTitleLine1: We pair AI-enriched data and machine learning insights with shopper behavior to automatically group products that make sense together—so customers discover more, and buy more.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection4SubTitleBody1: We integrate with a number of marketing automation platforms including Klaviyo, Yotpo, and Dotdigital.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection4SubTitleBody2: We add customer personalized recommendations in both email and SMS messaging that are dynamically personalized on open.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageMiddleSection5SubTitleLine1: Automatically adjust search result relevancy based on each shopper's preferences and current shopping behavior—improving relevancy and making products easier to find.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageBottomSectionLeftSide: With Athos, turn personalization into long-term customer loyalty.
recommendationProfiles.demoPageBottomSectionRightSide: Athos Commerce creates moments that matter—tailoring every touchpoint to each shopper's journey from real-time session-based suggestions to personalized segments for targeted messaging. With Athos Commerce, turn personalization into long-term customer loyalty.

advancedSettings.pageSubHeader: These advanced search settings are reserved for support admins only.
advancedSettings.autocompleteSearchableFieldWarning: Warning: Selected field is not searchable and will be ignored.

backgroundFilters.pageSubHeader: Automatically apply hidden filters to refine product results for specific search terms — without affecting what shoppers see in their filter options.
backgroundFilters.emptyFilterListSubtitle: Improve search results using background filters that quietly refine results for specific queries — without changing what shoppers see.
backgroundFilters.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry
backgroundFilters.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this background filter?
backgroundFilters.createFormInfoSubTitle: Background filters apply hidden refinements to search results when a specific query is used.
backgroundFilters.createFormExampleContent: Adding a background filter for the search term "rug" to apply the category filters "Area Rugs" and "Outdoor Rugs" will limit results to those categories, improving relevance and preventing unrelated items like bath mats from appearing.

exactMatch.pageSubHeader: Make sure shoppers only see results for the exact term they searched — ideal for unique product names or tightly targeted keywords.
exactMatch.emptyExactMatchListSubtitle: Use Exact Matches to return only the most relevant products for highly specific searches.
exactMatch.editFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Exact match successfully edited. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
exactMatch.deleteDialogSnackbarSuccessLabel: Exact match successfully deleted. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
exactMatch.createFormSnackbarsuccessLabel: Exact match successfully created. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
exactMatch.createFormTip: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
exactMatch.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this exact match?
exactMatch.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please wait a few minutes and retry.
exactMatch.createFormInfoSubTitle: Exact matches limit results to the exact word or phrase entered, excluding similar variations.
exactMatch.createFormExampleContent: Adding an exact match for "run" prevents broader results — like "running shoes" — from appearing when shoppers search for the brand Fast Run Shoes.

ignoreTerms.pageSubHeader: Improve search precision by excluding vague or broad terms that don’t contribute meaningful results.
ignoreTerms.createFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Ignore term successfully created. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
ignoreTerms.editFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Ignore term successfully edited. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
ignoreTerms.deleteDialogSnackbarSuccessLabel: Ignore term successfully deleted. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
ignoreTerms.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this ignore term?
ignoreTerms.createFormTip: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
ignoreTerms.emptyIgnoreTermsListSubtitle: Ignored terms allow you to disregard overly broad terms from search, so they don’t return irrelevant or unnecessary results across your catalog.
ignoreTerms.createFormInfoSubTitle: Ignore terms excludes specific terms from searches, preventing them from negatively affecting the relevance of results.
ignoreTerms.createFormExampleContent: Adding the ignore term "piece" helps avoid irrelevant or overly broad results in searches like "statement piece" or "accent piece."

nlp.pageSubHeader: Use NLP Product Discovery to unlock valuable keywords from your product data, making it easier for shoppers to find the right products.
nlp.nlpEnableBannerTitle: Boost product discoverability with NLP-curated keywords
nlp.nlpEnableBannerSubtitle: Leverage the power of Natural Language Processing (NLP) to extract keywords from product descriptions and improve product discovery in Search.
nlp.nlpDisableBannerSubtitle: NLP has been enabled for the field: __Field_Description__. Our language models may take up to 24 hours to generate keywords. To learn how NLP enhances your search results, visit the Resource Center using the icon in the bottom-right corner.
nlp.enableFormCustomFieldSelectionBodyText: Select the field in your data that contains the most detailed product description
nlp.enableFormDefaultSelectionSubitle: Use the default description field based on your platform
nlp.enableFormCustomFieldSelectionSubtitle: Select a custom description field to enable NLP
nlp.contactCustomerSuccessText: Interested in enabling this feature? Reach out to your Customer Success Manager or email us at __EmailID__ to learn more.

queryReplacements.pageSubHeader: Improve search results by replacing shopper queries with more relevant terms.
queryReplacements.createFormOriginalReplacementPlaceholder: Type search terms, separated by commas. Example: athleisurewear
queryReplacements.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this query replacement?
queryReplacements.emptyQueryReplacementListSubtitle: Help shoppers find the right products by replacing unhelpful terms — such as clear misspellings or outdated product names — with ones that match your catalog.
queryReplacements.createFormInfoSubTitle: Query replacements replace the shopper’s original search term with a more relevant one to improve results and better match your catalog.
queryReplacements.createFormExampleContent: Adding a query replacement for "stacking" to "stackable" helps shoppers see relevant products when "stacking" isn’t used in your catalog.

redirects.pageSubHeader: Set up redirects to send shoppers to a specific page when they search for certain terms.
redirects.emptyListSubtitle: Redirects let you guide shoppers to the most relevant content or product pages when they search specific terms.
redirects.existingRedirectUpdateDialogContentText: Do you want to add these search terms to the existing redirect URL?
redirects.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this redirect?
redirects.createFormOriginalPlaceholder: Type search terms, separated by commas
redirects.createFormInfoSubTitle: Redirects automatically send shoppers to a specific page when they search for certain terms, helping them find what they need faster.
redirects.uploadFormInformation: Add redirects in bulk by uploading a .csv file. Whenever a customer searches for the specified term(s), they will be redirected to the specified web page (URL).
redirects.uploadFormExampleCsvFormatTerms: Terms: Search term(s) you would like redirected, separated by comma.
redirects.uploadFormExampleCsvFormatUrl: URL: The page your shopper should land on when searching for a redirected term(s).
redirects.createFormTip: Note: If multiple redirects are created for the same search term, only the first one will take effect.
redirects.progressDescriptionText: We are uploading your files.Customers searching for the specified search terms will be redirected to the specified web page (URL). It'll take a moment.
redirects.errorDescriptionText: Oops! Something went wrong while uploading the file. Please try again later.
redirects.createFormExampleContent: Adding a redirect for "gift cards" will send shoppers to https://www.example.com/giftcards when they search that term.

spellCorrectionBlocklist.pageSubHeader: Prevent spell correction for terms that don’t exist in your catalog — such as brand names you don’t carry — to avoid showing irrelevant results.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.createFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Blocked term successfully created. Changes may take up to 5 minutes to take effect.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.editFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Blocked term successfully edited. Changes may take up to 5 minutes to take effect.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.blocklistDialogSnackbarSuccessLabel: Blocked term successfully deleted. Changes may take up to 5 minutes to take effect.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this blocked term?
spellCorrectionBlocklist.emptySpellCorrectionBlocklistListTitle: Build your Spell Correction Blocklist library.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.emptySpellCorrectionBlocklistListSubtitl: Spell correction doesn’t always get it right. Use the blocklist to prevent terms that aren’t in your catalog — like brands you don’t carry — from returning misleading results.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.createFormTip: Note: Changes may take up to 5 minutes to take effect.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.createFormPlaceholder: Type search term (no spaces). Example: Nike
spellCorrectionBlocklist.marketingSpellCorrectionBlocklistBannerT: Block specific terms for more accurate search results.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.marketingSpellCorrectionBlocklistBannerS: This feature allows you to ignore manually added terms during integrated spell correction, ensuring that they won't affect your search results.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.contactCustomerSuccessText: Interested in enabling this feature? Reach out to your Customer Success Manager or email us at __EmailID__ to learn more.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.createFormInfoSubTitle: The spell correction blocklist prevents terms from being auto-corrected by the integrated spell correction feature, so shoppers aren’t directed to unintended products.
spellCorrectionBlocklist.createFormExampleContent: Adding the blocked term "Nike" — when you don’t carry the brand — prevents it from being corrected to something unrelated, ensuring shoppers see a zero results page.

synonyms.pageSubheader: Connect similar terms so shoppers see relevant results — no matter which one they search for.
synonyms.createFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Synonym successfully created. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
synonyms.editFormSnackbarSuccessLabel: Synonym successfully edited. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
synonyms.deleteDialogSnackbarSuccessLabel: Synonym successfully deleted. Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
synonyms.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this synonym?
synonyms.groupSynonymsTabPanelSubheaderLabel: Grouped synonyms are sets of equivalent terms that return the same search results, no matter which term a shopper uses.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsTabPanelSubheaderLabel: One-way synonyms are directional relationships in which a search for one term also returns results for related terms, but not the other way around.
synonyms.emptyListSubtitle: Synonyms connect similar terms — like "jeans" and "denim" — so shoppers find what they need, no matter how they search.
synonyms.createFormPlaceholder: Type similar terms, separated by commas. Example: jeans, denim. Avoid grouping unrelated terms like jeans, leggings.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsCreateFormPlaceholder: Type the main search term. Example: skincare.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsCreateFormPlaceholderRetur: Type similar terms to include in results, separated by commas. Example: cleanser, moisturizer.
synonyms.createFromTip: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
synonyms.groupSynonymsCreateFormInfoSubTitle: Grouped synonyms are sets of equivalent terms that return the same search results, no matter which term a shopper uses.
synonyms.groupSynonymsCreateFormExampleContent: Adding "T-shirt," "crew," "tee," and "V-neck" as a grouped synonym will return the same search results for any of these terms.
synonyms.groupSynonymsEditFormExampleContent: Adding "T-shirt," "crew," "tee," and "V-neck" as a grouped synonym will return the same search results for any of these terms.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsCreateFormInfoSubTitle: One-way synonyms are directional relationships in which a search for one term also returns results for related terms, but not the other way around.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsEditFormExampleContent: A search for "jacket" can also return results for "blazer," "bomber," and "windbreaker," but searching for "blazer" won’t return all jackets.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormNote: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your data is synced.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormInformation: Add one-way synonyms in bulk by uploading a .csv file. One-way synonyms are useful for showing search results from more specific terms for a broad search term.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormDownloadReferenc: Download the one-way synonyms sample file or use the example below for reference.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormExampleCsvLeftSi: Left side: Add the broad search term(s) you’d like to return results for, separated by commas.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormExampleCsvRightS: Right side: Add the alternative term(s) Searchspring should return results for when the left side term(s) is searched.
synonyms.oneWaySynonymsUploadFormExampleExampleCs: Enabled: Select 1 for enabled or 0 for disabled.
synonyms.groupSynonymsUploadFormInformation: Add group synonyms in bulk by uploading a .csv file. Grouped synonyms are equivalent terms that will return the same search results for all terms.
synonyms.groupSynonymsUploadFormDownloadReference: Download the grouped synonyms sample file or use the example below for reference.
synonyms.groupSynonymsUploadFormExampleCsvFormatT: Terms: Add the search term(s) you would like to make equivalent, separated by commas.
synonyms.groupSynonymsUploadFormExampleCsvUrl: Enabled: Select 1 for enabled or 0 for disabled.
synonyms.progressDescriptionText: We are uploading your files. It’ll take a moment.
synonyms.errorDescriptionText: Oops! Something went wrong while uploading the file. Please try again later.

searchPreview.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-fields: Display data fields on result cards to help diagnose ranking and data quality issues that may be affecting performance.
searchPreview.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-options: Adjust your preview view and features to better understand the factors influencing your results.
searchPreview.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-sources: See which campaigns and rules are influencing your results to validate their impact and make quick adjustments as needed.
searchPreview.expandedSearchText: We couldn't find the minimum number of results with all the terms in '__query__'. The following results include at least one (but not all) of your search terms.
searchPreview.searchRedirectedText: Your search for '__query__' has been redirected to '__link__'.
searchPreview.personalizationText: Personalization is enabled for this search. Search Preview does not reflect the impact of personalization on the order of search results.
searchPreview.queryReplaceText: Your search for '__originalTerm__' has been replaced with '__replacementTerm__'.
searchPreview.ignoreTermsText: Your search term '__originalTerm__' has been ignored.
searchPreview.exactMatchText: Your term '__originalTerm__' will be matched exactly.
searchPreview.experimentDescription: These results are part of the campaign '__campaignName__', which has an experiment running.
searchPreview.zeroSearchResultLabel: No result found for your search '__query__'.
searchPreview.featuresLabel-spellCorrectionTooltipCont: This option is enabled or disabled by default based on your Integrated Spell Correction configuration.
searchPreview.featuresLabel-intellisuggestElevationsTo: This option is enabled or disabled by default based on your IntelliSuggest Elevations configuration.

badges.pageHeader: Highlight key products with customizable badges.
badges.pageSubHeader: Set rules, choose colors, and automate when badges appear to drive attention and action.
badges.deleteDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this badge?
badges.badgesFormNote: Note: Changes will take effect the next time your index is updated.
badges.badgesFormBadgeDesignDescription: Edit these parameters to control the appearance on your website. You can control things like badge position, look, and content here.
badges.badgesFormBadgeBehaviorDescription: Add custom behaviors and conditions for when the badge is applied.
badges.marketingBadgesTitle: Badges specific terms for more accurate search results.
badges.marktetingBadgeSubTitle: This feature allows you to ignore manually added terms during integrated spell correction, ensuring they won't affect your search results.
badges.ContactCustomerSuccessText: Interested in enabling this feature? Reach out to your Customer Success Manager or email us at __EmailID__ to learn more.
badges.discardChangesDialogConfirmationText: You will lose all changes made to this badge.
badges.>=-numericOperator: is more than or equal to
badges.<=-numericOperator: is less than or equal to
badges.maxBadgesLimitReached: You’ve reached your max limit for badges. Please delete one before creating another.
badges.badgeNameAlreadyExists: Another badge with same name already exists.
badges.badgeNameMustStartWithLetter: Name should start with a letter
badges.emptyBadgesListSubtitle: In a world where creativity flows, Ideas bloom like flowers in spring,Imagination knows no bounds.
badges.demoPageTopSectionSubTitle: Set rules, choose colors, and automate when badges appear to drive attention and action.
badges.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine1: The Badge Manager gives merchandisers full control over how badges look, where they appear, and when they're shown. Easily create custom badges like “New,” “Trending,” or “10% Off” to highlight key products.
badges.demoPageMiddleSection1SubTitleLine2: Overlay badges on product images, choose their placement, customize the text, or display them near the price to capture shopper attention and drive action.
badges.demoPageBottomSectionLeftSide: Turn shopper attention into action. With badges, call out new arrivals, sales, and more — automatically.

campaign.pageSubHeader: Promote products with flexible campaigns that drive engagement, boost conversions, and clear inventory fast.
campaign.emptyMerchandisingListSubtitle: Tailor results based on searches, categories, filters, and more to surface the right products at the right time. For example, when a shopper searches for "sandals," you can prioritize showing top-rated summer styles or new arrivals, rather than just a default product list.
campaign.emptyMerchandisingGlobalCampaignListSubt: Default campaigns apply across your site so shoppers see the most relevant products at the right time.
campaign.merchandisingTabPanelSubheaderLabel: Curate specific results when shoppers search or interact with categories, filters, and more.
campaign.globalCampaignTabPanelSubheaderLabel: Design the campaigns you want to be applied across your entire site.
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsPersonalizationDisa: Campaign does not have personalization enabled
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsBoostRulesAndMore: Campaign has __boosts_length__ boost rule(s): __boosts_name__ and __x_more_boosts__ more
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsNoBoostRules: Campaign does not have boost rule(s)
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsNoPinned: Campaign does not have pinned product(s)
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsFilterAndMore: Campaign has custom filter order enabled with __filters_length__ fields: __fields__, and __x_more_fields__ more
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsFilter: Campaign has custom filter order enabled with __filters_length__ fields: __fields__
campaign.tooltipConfigurationsNoFilter: Campaign does not have custom filter order enabled
campaign.tooltipViews: Number of times the campaign has been viewed by shoppers within last 30 days.
campaign.deleteDialogContentConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign(s)?
campaign.createFormErrorBannerLabel: Error: Something went wrong. Please try again in a few minutes.
campaign.folderDeleteDialogContentConfirmationTex: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? All campaigns inside will be moved to “Uncategorized.”
campaign.confirmDeleteForeverModelText: This campaign has an experiment running. Please end the experiment and choose a winner before deleting the campaign.
campaign.confirmDeleteForeverModelFutureDateText: This campaign has a scheduled experiment. Please discard the experiment before deleting the campaign.
campaign.confirmBulkDeleteForeverModelText: At least one of the selected campaigns has an experiment scheduled or running. Please deselect that campaign to proceed with deletion.

campaignCreate.createCampaignDialogFormTitle_campaign-s: What do you want to target with this campaign?
campaignCreate.campaignDescription-search: Merchandise a specific search query. Example: "leggings"
campaignCreate.campaignDescription-category: Merchandise category pages or filtered results. Example: "Men's Jeans"
campaignCreate.campaignDescription-location: Merchandise based on shopper location. Example: "Australia"
campaignCreate.campaignDescription-landing: Merchandise a custom product collection. Example: "Holiday Gift Guide"
campaignCreate.campaignDescription-segment: Merchandise based on shopper behavior or attributes. Example: "logged in"

campaignEditor.exitDialogConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to leave? If you've made changes that haven't been saved, they will be lost.
campaignEditor.backButtonExitConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to leave? If you've made changes that haven't been saved, they will be lost.
campaignEditor.campaignScheduleConflictError: This target overlaps with the campaign “__campaignName__” during the selected timeframe. Please adjust your target or schedule to resolve the conflict.
campaignEditor.campaignStatusNote: Note: Changes may take up to 5 minutes to appear for all users.
campaignEditor.campaignTooltipStatusQueueError: Publishing failed. Please try saving your campaign again.
campaignEditor.campaignTooltipStatusError: Your campaign was saved, but an error occurred. Please contact support for assistance.
campaignEditor.campaignTooltipStatusPendingError: Publishing is delayed. Please contact support for assistance.
campaignEditor.copyButtonNotSaveMessage: You can only copy a campaign after it's been saved.
campaignEditor.websiteChangeAlertDialogConfirmationText: You'll be redirected to __website__name__ to view and edit the copied campaign.
campaignEditor.copyFormInformationTitle: Choose the site you'd like to copy this campaign to.
campaignEditor.copyFormInformationSubtext: All existing configurations will be copied. If any product IDs don't match on the selected site, they won't be included in the copied campaign.
campaignEditor.contextCampaignContextFormDescription: Control where your campaign appears by targeting pages like search results, categories, and filtered views. It will apply to any pages that match the conditions below.
campaignEditor.contextPageTagNote: Editing this tag will change the URL of your landing page.
campaignEditor.contextSegmentLocationDescription: Control where your campaign appears by targeting shopper location. It will apply to the locations selected below.
campaignEditor.redirectsWarningNote: This campaign isn't live because it's being overriden by a redirect. To resolve this, __link__.
campaignEditor.productsSKUBannerText: Below is a preview of the products you've pasted. These products will be added and pinned to the top of your campaign when you click "Add Products."
campaignEditor.bulkImportIDDescription: Note: You can separate products by commas, line breaks, or tabs. IDs are mapped to your "id" field.
campaignEditor.bulkImportSKUDescription: SKUs are mapped to your "sku" field.
campaignEditor.scheduleCampaignActiveFromLabel: Set the start and end dates for when this campaign will be active on your site.
campaignEditor.scheduleConflictErrorMessageStartDate: Start date overlaps with an existing campaign using the same target.
campaignEditor.scheduleConflictErrorMessageEndDate: End date overlaps with an existing campaign using the same target.
campaignEditor.experimentConflictNoteText: Please resolve campaign conflicts before creating an experiment.
campaignEditor.boostsGroupingSubTitle: Set how products should be promoted or demoted.
campaignEditor.boostSubSortSubTitle: Set how equally boosted products should be sorted.
campaignEditor.boostNote: We've carried over the boost rules from your __globalCampaignLink__. You can remove or modify these rules for this campaign as needed.
campaignEditor.boostEmptyNote: At least one boost rule is required. Add a new rule or click "Reset to Default" to inherit rules from your Default Campaign.
campaignEditor.bannerPositionLabel: The placement of each banner is shown below.
campaignEditor.bannerInlineTooltip: This feature allows you to place up to four banners within the product results. Want to enable it? Contact your Customer Success Manager or email us at success@searchspring.com to learn more.
campaignEditor.bannerFormUrlToImageTooltip: Enter the URL of the image you want to display as your banner. Image size depends on your store's design, but a good starting point is 600×400 for inline banners and 1200×400 for full-width banners.
campaignEditor.bannerFormTargetUrlTooltip: Enter the URL where shoppers will be directed when they click the banner.
campaignEditor.bannerFormTitlePlaceholder: Type a title. Example: "Shop Our Summer Collection"
campaignEditor.bannerFormTitleLabelTooltip: Include a title to describe your image. This text appears on hover and can support accessibility.
campaignEditor.bannerFormAltTextPlaceholder: Describe the image. Example: "Banner showing summer sale with sandals"
campaignEditor.bannerFormAltTooltip: Provide a short description of the image for screen readers and accessibility. This text is also shown if the image fails to load.
campaignEditor.bannerFormVideoTooltip: Enter a video URL from YouTube or Vimeo.
campaignEditor.bannerFormVideoTitlePlaceholder: Type a title. Example: "Behind the Scenes of Our Spring Collection"
campaignEditor.bannerFormVideoTitleTooltip: Include a title to describe your video. This text appears on hover and can support accessibility.
campaignEditor.bannerFormVideoWidthTooltip: Specify the width of your video in pixels. Default: 400px.
campaignEditor.bannerFormVideoHeightTooltip: Specify the height of your video in pixels. Default: 300px.
campaignEditor.bannerFormHTMLNoteTitle: HTML banners support these media types:
campaignEditor.bannerFormHTMLNoteDescription:
Images: APNG, GIF, ICO, JPEG, PNG, SVG 
 Videos: MP4, WebM, OGG (Safari does not support OGG)
campaignEditor.bannerFooterInfoText: Footer Banner — This banner will appear at the bottom of the page.
campaignEditor.experimentNoExperimentRunningSubTitle: Gain insights into what works best by testing variations in personalization, boost rules, pinning, filters, and banners. Once an experiment is created, the original campaign becomes your control — it's locked so you can accurately compare results.
campaignEditor.experimentControlDescription: Select the top-performing variation. The configurations from the winning variation will replace your original campaign.
campaignEditor.experimentVariationDescription: Create variations for your experiment. Each variation represents a different test that will be measured against your original campaign (the control).
campaignEditor.experimentAddVariationLimitBannerText: You cannot add more variations to this experiment.
campaignEditor.experimentCustomerPlacementSubTitle: Set how traffic is split across your variations. Use the sliders to assign a percentage of customers to each variation during the experiment.
campaignEditor.findProductSubTitle: Control which products appear on your landing page using a search query, categories, or filters.
campaignEditor.selectWinnerSubTitle: Save your campaign to make it official.
campaignEditor.endDateNoteText: Extend your experiment by selecting a new end date.
campaignEditor.experimentScheduleSubTitle: Set the start and end dates for when this experiment will be active on your site. Once the experiment ends, your original campaign (the control) will stay live until you choose a winner.
campaignEditor.experimentDeleteConfirmationText: Ending this experiment early will stop all testing and keep the original campaign (control) live until you choose a winner. You won't be able to make changes to the experiment or restart it once it ends. Are you sure you want to continue?
campaignEditor.experimentDiscardDraftConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to discard this experiment? All variations will be deleted, and this action cannot be undone.
campaignEditor.campaignSaveProgressText: Saving and publishing your changes. Please wait…
campaignEditor.experimentNoteControl: You are viewing the control variation. This variation represents your original campaign and cannot be edited.
campaignEditor.experimentNoteVariationEdit: You are editing an experiment. Any configuration changes will apply to __variation_name__.
campaignEditor.experimentNoteLive: An experiment is currently running. The campaign is locked and cannot be edited until the experiment ends. View the __experiment_link__ to monitor performance.
campaignEditor.experimentNoteExpired: Your experiment has ended. Please select a winner to continue editing this campaign. __experiment_link__
campaignEditor.campaignLockedDescription: This area is locked by an experiment. To unlock it, discard or end the experiment.
campaignEditor.personalizationNoteText: Note: Personalization is enabled. The order of products on your site may vary for each shopper based on their behavior.
campaignEditor.experimentLimitionNoteText: You can't have more than five experiments at a time. Please discard or end an existing experiment before creating a new one.
campaignEditor.experimentRequirementsText: Please add a __requirements__ before creating an experiment.
campaignEditor.contextPageSegmentSubTitle: Control where your campaign appears by targeting segments based on shopper behavior or attributes. It will apply to any pages that contain the segment tag below.
campaignEditor.boostDefaultRuleTextTooltip: This is the default sort order your shoppers see on the page. When boost rules are applied, this sort order is used as the final tie-breaker.
campaignEditor.emptyProductDescription: Populate your landing page with products using the Add Products tab under Targeting.
campaignEditor.emptySearchProductDescription: No products matched this search query. Try refining your terms.
campaignEditor.queryContainsProductDescription: Using "Query contains" means this campaign will apply to any search where the shopper's query includes your specified terms. Pinning or removing individual products isn't available with this search type. To use those tools, change the search type to "Query is."
campaignEditor.experimentStartDateValidationError: Start date can't be before the campaign start date.
campaignEditor.experimentStartDateAfterEndDateValidatio: Start date can't be after the campaign end date.
campaignEditor.experimentEndDateValidationError: End date can't be after the campaign end date.
campaignEditor.experimentEndDateBeforeStartDateValidati: End date can't be before the campaign start date.
campaignEditor.experimentEndDateBeforeExperimentStartDa: End date can't be before the experiment start date.
campaignEditor.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-boosts: Use boost rules to promote or demote products based on fields like stock, publish date, or tags — helping you control visibility and influence shopper behavior.
campaignEditor.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-filters: Customize which filters shoppers see so the most relevant ones appear first — helping them discover products and convert faster.
campaignEditor.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-experimen: Run experiments to identify which merchandising strategies drive better results.
campaignEditor.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-personali: Control whether this campaign uses personalization to influence product rankings based on shopper behavior and preferences.
campaignEditor.contentDrawerHeaderDescription-banners: Drive shoppers to relevant landing pages and marketing campaigns by placing banners in high-impact areas.
campaignEditor.contextFormQueryTypeConflict: You can only use one type of search per campaign: either "Query contains" or "Query is."
campaignEditor.contextFormQueryPinnedConflict: Adding a search query will remove pinned products from this campaign.
campaignEditor.contextFormFilterConflict: Adding filters will remove pinned products from this campaign.
campaignEditor.contextFormFilterAndQueryConflict: Adding a search query or filters will remove pinned products from this campaign.
campaignEditor.unpinDialogConfirmationText: This action will remove all pinned products from your producty area
campaignEditor.chooseWinnerSectionSubtitle: Your experiment has ended. Choose a winner to unlock the campaign for editing. View the __experiment_link__ to compare performance before making a selection.

manageFeatures.pageSubHeader: These feature settings are reserved for support admins to control which platform features are enabled or disabled per site.
manageFeatures.legacyItem2Description: Access to edit templates for our older v2 integration catalog, which uses AJAX.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem2Description: Influence which variant of products will be represented on a product listing page.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem3Description: Allows for location-based campaigns and segments.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem4Description: Requires implementations changes for existing customers. Create product-sized banners pinned to specific positions in merchandising campaigns.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem5Description: Allows creation of a landing page in merchandising.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem6Description: Advanced feature to merchandise while targeting any group of shoppers in their eCommerce platform and sending via their integration.
manageFeatures.merchandisingItem7Description: Allows addition of customized badges on your products.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem1De: Required for any personalization-related feature. Runs fixed-interval generator to calibrate personalization.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem2De: Enable the Bundle recommendation type. Requires Personalization Generator.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem3De: Enables editing of Email and SMS recommendation profiles. Requires Personalization Generator.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem4De: Allows editing of profiles for personalized recommendations. Requires Personalization Generator.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem5De: Applies personalization to the Search API, impacting search results and category pages. Requires Personalization Generator.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem6De: Enable the tracking of shopper activity on your website to curate recommendations.
manageFeatures.personalizationAndRecommendationsItem7De: Enables customer metric data to be uploaded to one or more marketing automation platforms.
manageFeatures.reportingAndInsightsItem1Description: Enable Google Analytics 4. Requires reconnect to customer analytics account.
manageFeatures.reportingAndInsightsItem2Description: Users can reduce the data load for search insights and category insights to improve loading speed.
manageFeatures.engineeringZoneItem1Description: Shows the "Angular Templates" page in the "Templates" section of the Athos Console to all users of this account.
manageFeatures.engineeringZoneItem2Description: Allows for enabling access to Shopify sales and customer data.
manageFeatures.integratedSpellCorrectionItem1Descriptio: Enable Integrated Spell Correction in search requests.
manageFeatures.searchItem1Description: Access to the NLP Product Discovery page.

navigation.searchPreviewDescription: Analyze search results to refine and improve your search experience.

serverErrors./blockedSpellCorrectTerms/termTooLong: Search term cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./blockedSpellCorrectTerms/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ blocked spell correct terms.
serverErrors./blockedSpellCorrectTerms/termContainsWh: Term cannot contain white space. Remove spaces from term.
serverErrors./ignoreTerms/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ ignore terms.
serverErrors./ignoreTerms/termsTooLong: Combined search term's length cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./ignoreTerms/emptyTerms: Search terms list must contain at least one term.
serverErrors./queryReplacements/emptyTerms: Search terms list must contain at least one term.
serverErrors./queryReplacements/termsTooLong: Combined search term's length cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./queryReplacements/replacementTooLong: Replacement term cannot be longer than <maxLength> characters.
serverErrors./queryReplacements/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ query replacements.
serverErrors./exactMatches/termTooLong: Search term cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./exactMatches/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ exact matches.
serverErrors./synonyms/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ synonyms.
serverErrors./synonyms/unexpectedAlternateTerms: Alternate terms must be empty for grouped synonyms.
serverErrors./synonyms/unexpectedSingleTerm: You must have at least two search terms for grouped synonyms.
serverErrors./synonyms/emptyAlternateTerm: Alternate term cannot be blank for one-way synonyms.
serverErrors./synonyms/emptyAlternateTerms: Alternate terms must contain at least one term for one-way synonyms.
serverErrors./synonyms/emptyTerms: Search terms list must contain at least one term.
serverErrors./synonyms/termsTooLong: Combined search term's length cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./synonyms/alternateTermsTooLong: Combined alternate term's length cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./synonyms/termRepeatedInAlternateTerms: Term "__term__" is repeated in alternate terms.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ background filters.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/tooManyFilterFields: You cannot have more than __limit__ background filter fields.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/termTooLong: Search term cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/filterFieldValuesTooL: Combined filter field values length cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/emptyFilterFields: Filter fields list cannot be empty.
serverErrors./backgroundFilters/emptyFilterFieldValue: Filter field value cannot be blank.
Filter field values list must contain at least one field value.
serverErrors./redirects/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ redirects.
serverErrors./redirects/emptyTerms: Search terms list must contain at least one term.
serverErrors./redirects/termTooLong: Search term cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./redirects/urlTooLong: URL cannot be longer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./merchandisingFolders/emptyName: Please enter a name for the folder.
serverErrors./merchandisingFolders/nameTooLong: Folder names must be fewer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./merchandisingFolders/nameAlreadyExists: A folder named "__name__" already exists. Try a different name.

serverErrors./searchConfigurations/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ search configurations.
serverErrors./fields/tooMany: You cannot have more than __limit__ fields.
serverErrors./badges/invalidLocation: The location set structure is malformed.
serverErrors./devNotes/emptyDevNote: The developer note cannot be blank.
serverErrors./devNotes/devNoteTooLong: The developer note cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.
serverErrors./websites/invalidSiteId: Site ID "__siteId__" must match the pattern "__pattern__".
serverErrors./websites/domainNameTooLong: The domain name cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.
serverErrors./websites/indexLocationTooLong: The index location cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.

serverErrors./websites/secretKeyTooLong: The secret key cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.
serverErrors./websites/currencyCodeTooLong: The currency key cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.
serverErrors./feeds/invalidIndexTimeSlot: The index time slot "__indexTimeSlot__" is invalid.
serverErrors./recordModifiers/invalidOrder: The order must be between "__min__" and "__max__" (inclusive).
serverErrors./fieldSorts/invalidReorder: Reorder failed due to invalid ID set.
serverErrors./googleAnalyticsSettings/v2/siteSearchEv: Site search event cannot exceed "__maxLength__" characters.
serverErrors./displayFieldSettings/invalidOrderProper: Order properties must be between "__min__" and "__max__" (inclusive).
serverErrors./searchSettings/invalidResultsPerPage: Results per page must be between "__min__" and "__max__" (inclusive).
serverErrors./searchSettings/invalidDisplayItemSettin: Display item settings mode "__displayItemSettingsMode__" is invalid.
serverErrors./users/duplicateRole: Role "__role__" for website ID "__websiteId__" already exists.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/tooMany: You’ve reached the limit of __limit__ campaigns.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/tooManyEnabled: You’ve reached the limit of __limit__ active campaigns.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/tooManyGlobal: You’ve reached the limit of __limit__ default campaigns.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/tooManyIndefinit: You can only have __limit__ indefinite default campaign.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/invalidTitle: The campaign name must be between __min__ and __max__ characters.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/facetOrderTooLon: You’ve reached the limit for custom filters in this campaign.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/emptyFacetOrderI: Custom filter order must include at least one filter.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/boostsTooLong: You’ve reached the limit for boost rules in this campaign.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/productCodeTooLo: Product code must be fewer than __maxLength__ characters.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/invalidAddedProd: Added product order must be between __min__ and __max__.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/triggerDataTooLo: You’ve reached the limit for targets in this campaign.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/unexpectedTrigge: A target is not associated with the correct type: "__triggerType__".
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/missingTrigger: A search query is missing an input.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/emptyTriggerValu: A search query cannot be blank.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/missingMixedTrig: A mixed campaign must include at least __min__ targets.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/triggerConflict: One of your campaign targets conflicts with an existing campaign "__name__".
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/globalCampaignCo: This default campaign conflicts with another default campaign "__name__".
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/contentHtmlTooLo: You’ve reached the limit for HTML content.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/inlineContentMis: Inline banner is missing a position value.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/invalidContextDa: Targeting data must be valid JSON.
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/contextDataTooLo: You’ve reached the limit for targets in this campaign.

serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/invalidProductRu: Product rule data direction "__direction__" is invalid.

serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/tooManyVariants: you cannot have more than 5 variant under one campaign

serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/variantParentRes: parent resource with id "123" is a variant
serverErrors./merchandisingCampaigns/alreadyInPublish: This campaign is already queued for publishing.
serverErrors./experiments/invalidName: Experiment name must be fewer than __max__ characters.
serverErrors./experiments/invalidLowerBound: Customer placement must be between __min__% and __max__%.
serverErrors./experiments/invalidUpperBound: Customer placement must be between __min__% and __max__%.
serverErrors./experiments/invalidBound: Customer placements must account for 100% of the audience.
serverErrors./experiments/tooManyActive: You can't have more than five experiments at a time.
serverErrors./experiments/tooFewVariations: An experiment must include at least two variations.
serverErrors./experiments/tooManyVariations: An experiment can include up to five variations.
